unnormalised: Smart meters, eh? Our building in Chennai got 'em last Diwali. Bill seems lower, touchwood! But the data privacy, yaar, that's the real concern. Heard stories from my cousin Priya in IIT-Delhi about hacking risks. Hope they’re secure. Now I can finally afford more biryani this Onam! Rs. 50 saved is Rs. 50 earned. Any other Bangalore folks seeing similar savings?
